channel.title: F.e.a.r. 2
channel.description:
Just bought it today, so far it's pretty good. They still pull all the cheap tricks as they did in the first. Those tricks include objects randomly falling, people banging on windows/doors at the worst time, and Alma being a creepy little ho-bag and showing up right behind you as you turn around. That scared the shit out of me the first time it happened today. I haven't played enough to determine how much I like it, but I'm sure it's good. For some reason that one jolt scared me more than Dead Space has, and movies like that never do. Movies aren't scary, games are.
Anyone else bought this one?

item.description:
@R.I.P_RSC wrote:

Moparisthebest:

Doom 3 used to scare the shit out of me playing it late at night, wonder which is scarier?

I had that too. I’m not a great FPS player so I concentrate deeply. So when one of those monsters jumps out I get a small heart attack. It’s good to get the adrenaline flowing though.
